LIST.name: SDCard

CMD.body: $ dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=384 conv=fsync count=129
$ dd if=$FILE of=/dev/mmcblk%mmc% bs=1k seek=1 conv=fsync
